import memesData from "../data.js" import React from 'react' export default function Meme() { /** * Challenge: * 1. Set up the text inputs to save to * the `topText` and `bottomText` state variables. * 2. Replace the hard-coded text on the image with * the text being saved to state. */ const [meme, setMeme] = React.useState({ topText: "", bottomText: "", randomImage: "http://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg" }) const [allMemeImages, setAllMemeImages] = React.useState(memesData) function getMemeImage() { const memesArray = allMemeImages.data.memes const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memesArray.length) const url = memesArray[randomNumber].url setMeme(prevMeme => ({ ...prevMeme, randomImage: url })) } return (

One does not simply

Walk into Mordor

) }
